title: bukkit 无法开服
author: jim972601714
txt_content:
我下载了bukkit的最新版然后用txt文件去创了个run.bat
可总是找不到目标文件 ？ 然后只有按任何键关闭了？？？  bukkit最新版 求助 急急急

replies.author: john180
replies.txt_content: 既然成功了就把我设为最佳答案吧

replies.author: john180
replies.txt_content: 你得确定你run.bat里的路径和你java的安装路径相同

replies.author: jim972601714
replies.txt_content:
john180 发表于 2012-3-24 18:48 
你得确定你run.bat里的路径和你java的安装路径相同
我是copy wiki 上  how to make a server里的那段 
怎么查看java的路径？

replies.author: jim972601714
replies.txt_content:
john180 发表于 2012-3-25 15:46 
@echo off
java -Xincgc -Xmx1g -jar craftbukkit-1.0.1-R1.jar
pause
不信唉 上面写
‘java' is not recognized as an internal or external command,
operable program or batch file.
怎么办？？？？

replies.author: jim972601714
replies.txt_content:
john180 发表于 2012-3-26 17:08 
你家用的是JAVA6还是JAVA7
java-bit32

replies.author: john180
replies.txt_content:
如果是java6@ECHO OFF
IF /I "%PROCESSOR_ARCHITECTURE:~-2%"=="64"  "%ProgramFiles (x86)%\Java\JRE6\bin\java.exe" -Xms1024M -Xmx2048M -jar "%~dp0craftbukkit.jar"
IF /I "%PROCESSOR_ARCHITECTURE:~-2%"=="86"  "%ProgramFiles%\Java\JRE6\bin\java.exe" -Xincgc -Xmx1024M -jar "%~dp0craftbukkit.jar"复制代码如果是java7@ECHO OFF
IF /I "%PROCESSOR_ARCHITECTURE:~-2%"=="64"  "%ProgramFiles%\Java\JRE7\bin\java.exe" -Xms1024M -Xmx2048M -jar "%~dp0craftbukkit.jar"
IF /I "%PROCESSOR_ARCHITECTURE:~-2%"=="86"  "%ProgramFiles%\Java\JRE7\bin\java.exe" -Xincgc -Xmx1024M -jar "%~dp0craftbukkit.jar"

复制代码

replies.author: jim972601714
replies.txt_content:
john180 发表于 2012-3-27 17:15 
如果是java6如果是java7
我下了java7 用了你那个指令
“unable to access jarfile craftbukkit.jar"

replies.author: jim972601714
replies.txt_content:
等等 成功 了  
@echo off
java -Xincgc -Xmx1g -jar craftbukkit-1.0.1-R1.jar
pause
我吧craftbukkit的名字换成了我的那个craftbukkit文件夹的名字
